title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\Daemon
name: Daemon
description: This class is responsible for registering itself as a Debuggee with the Stackdriver backend. It will fetch the list of breakpoints from the Stackdriver backend, validate and normalize them, and store them into the configured breakpoint storage.

params.name: sourceRoot
params.description: The full path to the source root

params.name: options.client
params.description: A DebuggerClient to use. Defaults to a new DebuggerClient.

params.name: options.extSourceContext
params.description: The source code identifier. Defaults to values autodetected from the environment.

params.name: options.uniquifier
params.description: A string when uniquely identifies this debuggee. Defaults to a value autodetected from the environment.

params.name: options.description
params.description: A display name for the debuggee in the Stackdriver Debugger UI. Defaults to the uniquifier.

params.name: options.storage
params.description: The breakpoint storage mechanism to use. Defaults to a new SysvBreakpointStorage instance.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main loop for the daemon. Fetches breakpoints from the DebuggerClient and stores them in shared storage for the application to read. This function runs indefinitely.
